about_the_game:
Tumble Ball is a 3D-cubic maze solver with a simple goal; find the exit.
Navigate complicated labyrinths in various shapes and sizes, and compete with people from all over the world, for your place on the leaderboards.

Explore 250 levels, a multitude of maze structures, time trial game mode, leaderboards, a night mode, cloud saves, and more!

FEATURES

GAME MODES
Campaign Mode offers five different worlds, with corresponding labyrinths for you to progress through at your own pace.

Compete in Time Trial for your rank on the leaderboards. Discover endless new and exciting labyrinths, think fast and beat your best times in the Time Trial game mode. A time and score bonus is granted for every successful solve, scaling with the difficulty of the labyrinth.

LEADERBOARDS
Feeling competitive? Show the world who's the best Tumble Baller with the integrated Steam Leaderboards.

NIGHT MODE
Tumble Ball got you playing till the early morning? Yeah, us too. Be kind to your poor eyes with the new soothing night mode. Just as beautiful as the original, but won't burn your retinas.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any recent distribution with kernel version 2.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with at least 256MB VRAM, OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 90 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with at least 256MB VRAM, OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 90 MB available space

name: Tumble Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon X2 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with at least 256MB VRAM, DirectX 9 compatible
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
